After 100+ hours of testing and experimenting.

These 7 tools are what you need to master AI:

PS: to know how much I spend on AI, check my free guide at best-ai.blog. I update it every week.

☑ ChatGPT for everything.
☑ Gamma to make the best-looking slides.
☑ OpusClip to turn long videos into short clips.
☑ Blink to clone websites fast.
☑ EasyGen for LinkedIn co-writer.
☑ Nano Banana (inside Gemini) for image edits.
☑ Kinetix to turn video into 3D animation.
